FOR WHAT WE CHARGE A COMMISSION

Is it reasonable to pay a commission for rent? What makes the total amount of our commission?
How do we spend this money?

HOW WE MANAGE FUNDS

MONEY TRANSACTIONS

We free you from all the troubles of receiving prepayments from guests. On the other hand, we try to make the reservation payment quick and convenient for the clients of our service. VISA and MasterCard bank cards provide the greatest flexibility in this case. However, the simplicity for our customers entails the complex operation of 3 connected services that provide this functionality.

Bank Fee

Acquiring bank which provides a virtual POS-terminal charges a fee of 3–5% of the total transaction amount.

Bank Transfers

While transferring the reserved funds to the hosts, we lose 3% commission on bank transfers.

CUSTOMER SERVICE

Marketing Department

Our managers are watching everything happening on the website twenty-four hours a day. In case of delays in responses or emerging problems, our staff contact both guests and hosts by phone trying to resolve any issues as soon as possible. Such personal approach makes us different from the world's major services.

Technical Department

Our technical experts are making the website utterly easy, flexible and full-featured. However, every day we deal with extraordinary situations and individual needs of our customers. Such problems are solved by our programmers in a manual way.

WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT AND SUPPORT

Every month we spend money on support and development of the website. Often this work is invisible for our customers. As the modern saying goes, 'if you have done everything well, it may seem that you have done nothing'. In fact, the uninterrupted operation of our website is the daily hard work of our team.

CUSTOMER SERVICE

    Search Engine Optimization

    Our website has leading positions in Yandex and Google search engines. This allows us to get new customers every day, as well as provides a constant flow of booking for our hosts. Every day we are working to further develop and adapt our website to various search engines.

    Social Media Optimization

    Advertising in social networks is the most progressive form of today's advertising. Social media are the place where people now plan their leisure time and look for new ideas for their summer vacation. Our team is working to find and consult your future guests!

  • Regional Advertising

    We invest heavily in advertising of our project in different countries analyzing the needs and situations in every region. Thanks to this flexible, individual approach, we encourage a larger number of bookings and focus attention of our potential customers on those offers that are of interest to this specific audience.

  • Campaigns for Bulgarian Destinations

    Our research has shown that a large number of people have a misconception about Bulgarian resorts. Many of them remember the resorts of the distant Soviet past. Today, Bulgaria has modern European resorts at the most affordable prices in Europe. We run campaigns to attract people to this area. We believe that this effort will increase the number of tourists for this destination and, consequently, the number of your bookings.

Хотите быть в курсе последних объявлений? Подпишитесь на эксклюзивную рассылку предложений
